title: HoP 130 - State of Mind - al-Farabi on Religion and Politics
itunes:title: HoP 130 - State of Mind - al-Farabi on Religion and Politics
description: Al-Fārābī combines Islam and Greek sources to present the ideal ruler as a philosopher who is also a prophet.
